pages.text: Sometimes you have cards that you don't want to risk anything happening to. The ender binder, much like the ender chest, has the same amount of storage as a normal binder, and will keep your cards safe forever.

pages.title: Ender Binder
pages.text: Even if it is destroyed, you can just make a new one, and it will have your cards in it. Each player has their own inventory in an ender binder only they have access to.
